snippet.title: #AkiRobots Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
#AkiRobots is a 2D puzzle platformer where you control multiple characters simultaneously. The goal is simple; Get an Aki to a socket to win. The game includes 100 levels and players can modify existing levels, create new levels to share and import other players’ levels via the level editing and sharing system. 

Features:
• A unique simple-to-grasp game mechanic that anybody can understand
• 100 increasingly mind-bending levels
• Ability to remix existing levels or create entirely new ones via the level editor
• Cross platform level sharing via the level code system

Tweet us your level @akirobotsgame, post it on the Steam forums, or on our #AkiRobots Discord server.

iOS: https://bit.ly/akirobotsforios
Google Play: https://bit.ly/akirobotsandroid
Steam: https://bit.ly/2K5MXhl
----
Website: flatponies.com
Twitter: twitter.com/flatponies
Facebook: facebook.com/flatponies
Instagram: instagram.com/flatponies
